page.title: 09HEALTH CARE IN HOLYWELL
page.content: {11 doctors,}10 men and 1 woman,work in{3 practices}in Holywell serving {22000 patients,}each working with receptionists,community nurses,mid- wives and health visitors in a'Primary Health Care Team'.Seeing a GP is free but prescriptions cost Â£2 each.Child- ren,poor,chronically sick or unemploy- ed are exempt, but all are registered with a GP.Free specialist{clinics}are held to which patients may be referred waiting time varies from 3 weeks to 6 months,while surgery may take 2 years. The{Cottage Hospital}has 20 beds run by GPs.{Lluesty Hospital}has 140 beds for elderly patients.The greatest preventable cause of death is cigar- ette smoking,an addiction which plays a part in 25% of all deaths.It remains legal to advertise and sell cigarettes Today in the High Street 20 cigarette brand symbols are visible.
